channel.title: Other people cant get on my server
channel.description: ive portforwared done my no-ip but it says i need to log in onto 0.0.0.0 but then no one else can get on help please?

item.title: Other people cant get on my server
item.dc:creator: @tajkillerscape tajkillerscape
item.description:
@tajkillerscape wrote:

make sure you ip is the same of the one your port fowarding…(so check you ip) (then go into your router and check the one your portfowarding and make sure they match…that always used to get me…)

Read full topic
item.source: Other people cant get on my server

item.title: Other people cant get on my server
item.dc:creator: @Rog3r Rog3r
item.description:
@Rog3r wrote:

You need to connect on 0.0.0.0, others need to connect by using your IP address.

Read full topic
